get.description: Returns paginated activity logs with action, entity type, and actor filtering

parameters.name: actor
parameters.description: Filter by actor name or ID

get.description: Returns paginated categories with optional filtering and sorting

post.description: Creates a new category with the provided details

slug.description: Unique URL slug for the category

items.example: The name has already been taken.
The slug has already been taken.

put.description: Updates specified fields of a category

items.example: The name has already been taken.

delete.description: Permanently removes a category from the system

get.description: Returns paginated posts with search, sorting, and category filtering

post.description: Creates a new blog post with the provided details

items.example: The selected category id is invalid.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific post including its category

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the post to retrieve

delete.description: Soft Deletes a post from the system

patch.description: Partially update a post's title, content, or category

items.example: The selected category id is invalid.

id.description: Unique identifier for the log entry

changed_fields.description: JSON object showing before/after values of changed fields

actor.description: User or system that performed the action

updated_at.description: When the log entry was last updated
